Articles.Content:
Salutations.

What are your guilty little pleasures?

Mine are (of course) MLP: FiM and Japanese animes like Powerpuff Girls Z and Dokoro-chan. (Honestly, look up the second one. It\'s so dumb and in-the-gutter you\'ll laugh your pants off.)

GO!

Hitting Space when i still have boost left in the booster

-BOOM-
Building rockets not on KSP.

Hitting space when i still have fuel left in the SRBs

MLP: FiM

Blockland

Minecraft

KSP

I used to watch Backyardigans.

I loved that shit.
Spamming forum games like a little child up to the point where everyone\'s totally pissed off with me.
MLP. its just so good!
Saying something controversial on Facebook, and then standing back and watching.

I would say MLP, but that\'s not something I feel guilty about at all. But I don\'t feel guilty about much of anything, so... Hm. Minecraft, I guess? Oh, and I consider Speed Racer to be one of the greatest films of all time.

A very strong addiction to muffins and chocolate chip cookies.

Uh, what else, maybe being a 4chan regular.
Anouther one of mine. Being an anarchist (maybe that\'s the reason I ask so many questions).

King Sized Hershey Bars in the few hours I have left before I get diabetes and chocolate poisoning. :V

Also, Penny.
INTERNET and GAMES, in general. Also, chocolates

Pokemon ((not that new shit. I only really play Generation 3))

Actually in the middle of training my Oddish to beat Misty

Well, definitively MLP, because if that got out I would be murdered in ten seconds flat.

Hmm. I kinda troll conspiracy theorists and religious extremeists on Youtube, but I\'m kinda proud of that, haha

If I were asked which franchise I thought was better out of Pokemon and Digimon, I would say the latter.

The story is written better.

HAHA MLP PEOPLE - YOU CAN\'T LAUGH AT ME BECAUSE \'WELL WRITTEN STORIES\' IS YOUR EXCUSE FOR WATCHING MULTICOLOURED PONIES GO ABOUT THEIR DAILY LIVES.

If I were asked which franchise I thought was better out of Pokemon and Digimon, I would say the latter.

The story is written better.

HAHA MLP PEOPLE - YOU CAN\'T LAUGH AT ME BECAUSE \'WELL WRITTEN STORIES\' IS YOUR EXCUSE FOR WATCHING MULTICOLOURED PONIES GO ABOUT THEIR DAILY LIVES.

I have to agree there.

I have to agree there.

First series - reasonably well done. Since I like PDAs, I found how they use their digivices [i remembered that. Wierd.] as digital clocks when they\'re in the real world was interesting. Multiple uses for something thats supposed to host a virtual sentient organism. Funny how things work out like that.

Second series - less interesting. Not a lot else to say.

Third series - A red dinosaur in a cardboard box, and the Japanese authority actually puts its ass in gear and starts sending helicopter gunships and stealth bombers with EMP charges at the invading digimon. That... its like Godzilla but with more cuteness whilst not quite the kind of sickly sweet cuteness that MLP seems to give out by forcing it down everyone\'s throats.

Fourth series - saw five minutes of it, got bored, didn\'t watch any more.

Watching the original Power Rangers. The low budget and slight racism(Black Ranger is a black guy) makes it very funny!

The same applies to \'67 Spider-man

Pokemon ((not that new shit. I only really play Generation 3))

Actually in the middle of training my Oddish to beat Misty

~750 hours spent on pokemon leafgreen.

Saying something controversial on Facebook, and then standing back and watching.

I do this. It\'s quite fun.

Speed Racer to be one of the greatest films of all time.

I loved the movie, even the old cartoons. Looked like they modeled some of the actions and made it look 'B-movie-ish' on purpose. I guess why a lot of people didnt like cause they didn\'t understand or thought it would be the same as the cartoon.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

My guilty pleasure would maybe be Half Life 2: Death Match; I have over 700 hours logged. I loved the game.

Minecraft

Watching the original Naruto. (I still haven\'t finished it)

Reading MLP:FIM Shipping fan-fics such as:

http://www.equestriadaily.com/2011/09/story-my-dream-mare.html

http://www.equestriadaily.com/2011/08/story-allegrezza.html (This one is pretty good)

http://www.equestriadaily.com/2011/08/story-confessions-and-considerations.html

Do I Win?
